sn51.1:4.1: “Mendicants, when these four bases of psychic power are developed and cultivated they lead to going from the near shore to the far shore.
sn51.1:4.3: It’s when a mendicant develops the basis for psychic power that has samādhi due to enthusiasm, and active endeavor. They develop the basis for psychic power that has samādhi due to energy, and active endeavor. They develop the basis for psychic power that has samādhi due to higher mind, and active endeavor. They develop the basis for psychic power that has samādhi due to inquiry, and active endeavor.
sn51.1:4.4: When these four bases of psychic power are developed and cultivated they lead to going from the near shore to the far shore.”
